segments.text: Jenny , are you having fun here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . This is really a nice party with wonderful people and lovely wines .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m glad you ’ re enjoying it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s my pleasure . Would you like another glass of champagne ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , please . Thank you for everything .
segments.speaker: S2
